name: Roll of the Wand
description:
a = move left

d = move right

SPACE = use wand/ staff

a circle will appear if the dragon name gagon is within reach of you taking some of his health.

me and my friend joseph made this, i did the art and programming and he did the sounds and music. We will leave the used and unused music for download .

the theme is the wand, it has random moves.

this game is going to have updates.

there are instructions for download.
